'''''J.R.R. Tolkien: Man of Fantasy''''' is a booklet published as part of Kipling Press' "Classic Author Series". It is written by Russell Shorto, with a foreword by G.B. Tennyson.

==External links==
* ''[https://archive.org/details/jrrtolkienmanoff0000shor J.R.R. Tolkien: Man of Fantasy]'' at the [[wikipedia:Internet Archive|Internet Archive]] (available to borrow for free)
